snippet: China’s first aircraft carrier, a 1980s Soviet warship that has been refitted with modern weaponry, will go into service later this year, state-run media quoted a top navy official as saying on Tuesday.
abstract: China announces that it will put its first aircraft carrier, a 1980s Soviet warship that has been refitted with modern weaponry, into service later in the year.
lead_paragraph: China’s first aircraft carrier, a 1980s Soviet warship that has been refitted with modern weaponry, will go into service later this year, state-run media quoted a top navy official as saying on Tuesday.

headline.main: China: New Aircraft Carrier Is a Vintage Soviet Model
headline.print_headline: China: New Aircraft Carrier Is a Vintage Soviet Model
